name: Arcana Arboretum
description:
A little tarot garden. Reflect on what you're carrying.

Welcome to the Arcana Arboretum. Walk through three gardens, take one thing from each, and get a tarot reading based on what you chose.

Contains the Major Arcana for now; I might add more cards in future.

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Confirm choices with right-arrow, or Enter.

Made with Bitsy, and completed during the "Finish Your Game" Jam.

Made with the help of Bitsy Savior, Borksy, these three hacks by Sean S. Leblanc, and some troubleshooting from several nice folks in the Bitsy Discord. Leaves background from SubtlePatterns. Banner fonts are Diara & Fleurs de Liane.

Want a tarot reading with all the cards, fewer words, and less walking around? Try my other thing.
